PageTitle: resource cpu weight (VS resource template view)
FuncDef:
The resource cpu weight command assigns CPU weight to a resource template.
The undo resource cpu weight command deletes the CPU weight of a resource template.
By default, CPU weight values assigned to Admin-VS and other VSs are 10 and 5 respectively.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies CPU weight.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 10.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To assign CPU weight to a resource template, run the resource cpu weight command. If a VS is created using the resource template, CPU weight is automatically set for the VS.
You can specify resource specifications for the resource template and assign the resource template to the VS in order to assign resources in batches to the VS. This improves the flexibility of VS resource management. It also improves the usability and security of VSs so that other VSs can still be used when one VS is attacked.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
